Module uno_game
Package game_model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game_model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
public class Game extends Object implements Constants
Represents the main game logic and state for the UNO game. Handles player turns, card drawing, and game rules.

      public void removePlayedCard(ViewCard playedCard)
      Removes a played card from the player's hand and handles UNO penalties.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - the card that was played.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(ViewCard topCard)
      Draws a card for the current player. If the player cannot play the drawn card, the turn is switched.
      Parameters:
      topCard - the top card on the discard pile.
